definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[[נחם]]] vb. Niph. be sorry, console, oneself, etc. (only in der. species) (NH Pi. comfort; Ph. in n.pr. Lzb:322; Targum Pa. = NH, and deriv.; Chr Pal Aram. Pa. id., Schwally:Idiot. 54; Ar. nah.ama breathe pantingly (of horse));—Niph. Pf. [[נִחַם]] Am 7:3 + 4 t.; [[נִחָם]] Je 20:16 + 2 t.; 1 S. [[נִחַמְתִּי]] Ge 6:7 + 8 t.; [[נִחָָמְתִּי]] Zec 8:14; 2 mpl. [[נִחַמְתֶּם]] Ez Eze 14:22; Impf. [[יִנׇּחֵם]] Ex 13:17 + 6 t.; [[וַיִּנׇּ֫תֶם]] Ge 6:6 + 6 t.; + 5 t. Impf.; Imv. [[הִנׇּחֵם]] Ex 32:12, Ps 90:13.; Inf. [[הִנׇּחֵם]] Je 31:15, 1Sa 15:29; Pt. [[נִחָם]] Ju Jdg 21:15 + 3 t.;—
be sorry, moved to pity, have compassion, for others, abs. Je 15:6; c. [[על]] Ps 90:13; [[אֶל]] Ju Jdg 21:6; [[לְ]] v:Jdg 21:15; [[מִן]] Jdg 2:18.
comfort oneself, be comforted: abs. Ge 38:12 (J) Ps 77:3 Ez Eze 31:16; c. [[עַל]] 2Sa 13:39 Je 31:15; [[על הרעה]], concerning the evil Ez Eze 14:22, Eze 32:31; [[אחרי]] Ge 24:67 (J).
comfort oneself, ease oneself,  by taking vengeance c. [[מן]] Is 1:24; [[על]] Is 57:6.

definitions.title: Pual
definitions.body: Pf. [[נֻחָָמָה]] Is 54:11; Impf. [[תְּנֻחָָמוּ]] Is 66:13; be comforted, consoled.
be sorry, have compassion  [[עַל־עֲבָדָיו]] upon his servants De 32:36 = Ps 135:14.
comfort oneself, be comforted,  abs. Ge 37:35 (J), Ps 119:52.
ease oneself, by taking vengeance Ez Eze 5:13 (?); c. [[לִ]] pers. Ge 27:42 (JE): cf.
